s2.title: Migrating from &XercesCName; 2.1.0 to &XercesCName; &XercesCVersion;
s2.p: The following section is a discussion of the technical differences between &XercesCName; 2.1.0 code base and the &XercesCName; &XercesCVersion;.

s3.title: Using C++ Namespace
s3.p: All the binary distributions of &XercesCName; &XercesCVersion; are now built with C++ Namespace enabled. Therefore users' applications that links with the distributed binary packages must namespace qualified all the &XercesCName; classes/data/variables with "&XercesCNamespace;::" or add the "using namespace &XercesCNamespace;" clause.
See the Programming Guide Using C++ Namespace for more details.
